verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֤חַ ׀ <WH5329> To the chief Musician לְעֶ֥בֶד <WH5650> the servant יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> of the LORD לְדָ֫וִ֥ד <WH1732> [A Psalm] of David אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> who דִּבֶּ֨ר ׀ <WH1696> who spake לַיהוָ֗ה <WH3068> unto the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> דִּ֭בְרֵי <WH1697> the words הַשִּׁירָ֣ה <WH7892> of this song הַזֹּ֑את <WH2063> in בְּי֤וֹם <WH3117> in the day הִֽצִּיל־ <WH5337> delivered יְהוָ֘ה <WH3068> [that] the LORD אוֹת֥וֹ <WH853> מִכַּ֥ף <WH3709> him from the hand כָּל־ <WH3605> of all אֹ֝יְבָ֗יו <WH341> of all his enemies וּמִיַּ֥ד <WH3027> and from the hand שָׁאֽוּל׃ <WH7586> of Saul וַיֹּאמַ֡ר <WH559> And he said אֶרְחָמְךָ֖ <WH7355> I will love יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> thee O LORD חִזְקִֽי׃ <WH2391> my strength

יְהוָ֤ה ׀ <WH3068> The LORD סַֽלְעִ֥י <WH5553> [is] my rock וּמְצוּדָתִ֗י <WH4686> and my fortress וּמְפַ֫לְטִ֥י <WH6403> and my deliverer אֵלִ֣י <WH410> my God צ֭וּרִי <WH6697> my strength אֶֽחֱסֶה־ <WH2620> in whom I will trust בּ֑וֹ מָֽגִנִּ֥י <WH4043> my buckler וְקֶֽרֶן־ <WH7161> and the horn יִ֝שְׁעִ֗י <WH3468> of my salvation מִשְׂגַּבִּֽי׃ <WH4869> [and] my high tower

מְ֭הֻלָּל <WH1984> [who is worthy] to be praised אֶקְרָ֣א <WH7121> I will call יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> upon the LORD וּמִן־ <WH4480> at אֹ֝יְבַ֗י <WH341> from mine enemies אִוָּשֵֽׁעַ׃ <WH3467> so shall I be saved
אֲפָפ֥וּנִי <WH661> compassed חֶבְלֵי־ <WH2256> The sorrows מָ֑וֶת <WH4194> of death וְֽנַחֲלֵ֖י <WH5158> me and the floods בְלִיַּ֣עַל <WH1100> of ungodly men יְבַֽעֲתֽוּנִי׃ <WH1204> made me afraid
חֶבְלֵ֣י <WH2256> The sorrows שְׁא֣וֹל <WH7585> of hell סְבָב֑וּנִי <WH5437> compassed me about קִ֝דְּמ֗וּנִי <WH6923> prevented מ֣וֹקְשֵׁי <WH4170> the snares מָֽוֶת׃ <WH4194> of death

בַּצַּר־ <WH6862> In my distress לִ֤י ׀ אֶֽקְרָ֣א <WH7121> I called יְהוָה֮ <WH3068> upon the LORD וְאֶל־ <WH413> to אֱלֹהַ֪י <WH430> unto my God אֲשַׁ֫וֵּ֥עַ <WH7768> and cried יִשְׁמַ֣ע <WH8085> he heard מֵהֵיכָל֣וֹ <WH1964> out of his temple קוֹלִ֑י <WH6963> my voice וְ֝שַׁוְעָתִ֗י <WH7775> and my cry לְפָנָ֤יו ׀ <WH6440> before תָּב֬וֹא <WH935> came בְאָזְנָֽיו׃ <WH241> him [even] into his ears

וַתִּגְעַ֬שׁ <WH1607> shook וַתִּרְעַ֨שׁ ׀ <WH7493> and trembled הָאָ֗רֶץ <WH776> Then the earth וּמוֹסְדֵ֣י <WH4146> the foundations הָרִ֣ים <WH2022> also of the hills יִרְגָּ֑זוּ <WH7264> moved וַ֝יִּתְגָּֽעֲשׁ֗וּ <WH1607> and were shaken כִּי־ <WH3588> because חָ֥רָה <WH2734> because he was wroth לֽוֹ׃

עָ֘לָ֤ה <WH5927> There went up עָשָׁ֨ן ׀ <WH6227> a smoke בְּאַפּ֗וֹ <WH639> out of his nostrils וְאֵשׁ־ <WH784> and fire מִפִּ֥יו <WH6310> out of his mouth תֹּאכֵ֑ל <WH398> devoured גֶּ֝חָלִ֗ים <WH1513> coals בָּעֲר֥וּ <WH1197> were kindled מִמֶּֽנּוּ׃ <WH4480> at
וַיֵּ֣ט <WH5186> He bowed שָׁ֭מַיִם <WH8064> the heavens וַיֵּרַ֑ד <WH3381> also and came down וַ֝עֲרָפֶ֗ל <WH6205> and darkness תַּ֣חַת <WH8478> under רַגְלָֽיו׃ <WH7272> [was] under his feet

וַיִּרְכַּ֣ב <WH7392> And he rode עַל־ <WH5921> upon כְּ֭רוּב <WH3742> upon a cherub וַיָּעֹ֑ף <WH5774> and did fly וַ֝יֵּ֗דֶא <WH1675> yea he did fly עַל־ <WH5921> upon כַּנְפֵי־ <WH3671> upon the wings רֽוּחַ׃ <WH7307> of the wind

יָ֤שֶׁת <WH7896> He made חֹ֨שֶׁךְ ׀ <WH2822> darkness סִתְר֗וֹ <WH5643> his secret place סְבִֽיבוֹתָ֥יו <WH5439> round about סֻכָּת֑וֹ <WH5521> his pavilion חֶשְׁכַת־ <WH2824> him [were] dark מַ֝֗יִם <WH4325> waters עָבֵ֥י <WH5645> [and] thick clouds שְׁחָקִֽים׃ <WH7834> of the skies

מִנֹּ֗גַהּ <WH5051> At the brightness נֶ֫גְדּ֥וֹ <WH5048> before עָבָ֥יו <WH5645> [that was] before him his thick clouds עָבְר֑וּ <WH5674> passed בָּ֝רָ֗ד <WH1259> hail וְגַֽחֲלֵי־ <WH1513> [stones] and coals אֵֽשׁ׃ <WH784> of fire

וַיַּרְעֵ֬ם <WH7481> also thundered בַּשָּׁמַ֨יִם ׀ <WH8064> in the heavens יְֽהוָ֗ה <WH3068> The LORD וְ֭עֶלְיוֹן <WH5945> and the Highest יִתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> gave קֹל֑וֹ <WH6963> his voice בָּ֝רָ֗ד <WH1259> hail וְגַֽחֲלֵי־ <WH1513> [stones] and coals אֵֽשׁ׃ <WH784> of fire

וַיִּשְׁלַ֣ח <WH7971> Yea he sent out חִ֭צָּיו <WH2671> his arrows וַיְפִיצֵ֑ם <WH6327> and scattered וּבְרָקִ֥ים <WH1300> lightnings רָ֝ב <WH7232> them and he shot out וַיְהֻמֵּֽם׃ <WH2000> and discomfited

וַיֵּ֤רָא֨וּ ׀ <WH7200> were seen אֲפִ֥יקֵי <WH650> Then the channels מַ֗יִם <WH4325> of waters וַֽיִּגָּלוּ֮ <WH1540> were discovered מוֹסְד֪וֹת <WH4146> and the foundations תֵּ֫בֵ֥ל <WH8398> of the world מִגַּעֲרָ֣תְךָ֣ <WH1606> at thy rebuke יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> O LORD מִ֝נִּשְׁמַ֗ת <WH5397> at the blast ר֣וּחַ <WH7307> of the breath אַפֶּֽךָ׃ <WH639> of thy nostrils
יִשְׁלַ֣ח <WH7971> He sent מִ֭מָּרוֹם <WH4791> from above יִקָּחֵ֑נִי <WH3947> he took יַֽ֝מְשֵׁ֗נִי <WH4871> me he drew מִמַּ֥יִם <WH4325> waters רַבִּֽים׃ <WH7227> me out of many

יַצִּילֵ֗נִי <WH5337> He delivered מֵאֹיְבִ֥י <WH341> enemy עָ֑ז <WH5794> me from my strong וּ֝מִשֹּׂנְאַ֗י <WH8130> and from them which hated כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for אָמְצ֥וּ <WH553> me for they were too strong מִמֶּֽנִּי׃ <WH4480> were too
יְקַדְּמ֥וּנִי <WH6923> They prevented בְיוֹם־ <WH3117> me in the day אֵידִ֑י <WH343> of my calamity וַֽיְהִי־ <WH1961> become יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> but the LORD לְמִשְׁעָ֣ן <WH4937> was my stay לִֽי׃
וַיּוֹצִיאֵ֥נִי <WH3318> He brought me forth לַמֶּרְחָ֑ב <WH4800> also into a large place יְ֝חַלְּצֵ֗נִי <WH2502> he delivered כִּ֘י <WH3588> because חָ֥פֵֽץ <WH2654> me because he delighted בִּֽי׃

יִגְמְלֵ֣נִי <WH1580> rewarded יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> The LORD כְּצִדְקִ֑י <WH6664> me according to my righteousness כְּבֹ֥ר <WH1252> according to the cleanness יָ֝דַ֗י <WH3027> of my hands יָשִׁ֥יב <WH7725> hath he recompensed לִֽי׃

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for שָׁ֭מַרְתִּי <WH8104> For I have kept דַּרְכֵ֣י <WH1870> the ways יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> not רָ֝שַׁ֗עְתִּי <WH7561> and have not wickedly departed מֵאֱלֹהָֽי׃ <WH430> from my God

כִּ֣י <WH3588> for כָל־ <WH3605> for all מִשְׁפָּטָ֣יו <WH4941> For all his judgments לְנֶגְדִּ֑י <WH5048> were before וְ֝חֻקֹּתָ֗יו <WH2708> his statutes לֹא־ <WH3808> did not אָסִ֥יר <WH5493> [were] before me and I did not put away מֶֽנִּי׃ <WH4480> at
וָאֱהִ֣י <WH1961> was also תָמִ֣ים <WH8549> I was also upright עִמּ֑וֹ <WH5973> and I וָ֝אֶשְׁתַּמֵּ֗ר <WH8104> before him and I kept מֵעֲוֹנִֽי׃ <WH5771> myself from mine iniquity

וַיָּֽשֶׁב־ <WH7725> recompensed יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Therefore hath the LORD לִ֣י כְצִדְקִ֑י <WH6664> me according to my righteousness כְּבֹ֥ר <WH1252> according to the cleanness יָ֝דַ֗י <WH3027> of my hands לְנֶ֣גֶד <WH5048> in עֵינָֽיו׃ <WH5869> in his eyesight

עִם־ <WH5973> With חָסִ֥יד <WH2623> With the merciful תִּתְחַסָּ֑ד <WH2616> thou wilt shew thyself merciful עִם־ <WH5973> with גְּבַ֥ר <WH1399> man תָּ֝מִ֗ים <WH8549> with an upright תִּתַּמָּֽם׃ <WH8552> thou wilt shew thyself upright

עִם־ <WH5973> With נָבָ֥ר <WH1305> With the pure תִּתְבָּרָ֑ר <WH1305> thou wilt shew thyself pure וְעִם־ <WH5973> and with עִ֝קֵּ֗שׁ <WH6141> and with the froward תִּתְפַּתָּֽל׃ <WH6617> thou wilt shew thyself froward

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for אַ֭תָּה <WH859> you עַם־ <WH5971> people עָנִ֣י <WH6041> the afflicted תוֹשִׁ֑יעַ <WH3467> For thou wilt save וְעֵינַ֖יִם <WH5869> looks רָמ֣וֹת <WH7311> high תַּשְׁפִּֽיל׃ <WH8213> but wilt bring down

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for אַ֭תָּה <WH859> You תָּאִ֣יר <WH215> For thou wilt light נֵרִ֑י <WH5216> my candle יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱ֝לֹהַ֗י <WH430> my God יַגִּ֥יהַּ <WH5050> will enlighten חָשְׁכִּֽי׃ <WH2822> my darkness
כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for בְ֭ךָ אָרֻ֣ץ <WH7323> For by thee I have run through גְּד֑וּד <WH1416> a troop וּ֝בֵֽאלֹהַ֗י <WH430> and by my God אֲדַלֶּג־ <WH1801> have I leaped over שֽׁוּר׃ <WH7791> a wall

הָאֵל֮ <WH410> [As for] God תָּמִ֪ים <WH8549> [is] perfect דַּ֫רְכּ֥וֹ <WH1870> his way אִמְרַֽת־ <WH565> the word יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> of the LORD צְרוּפָ֑ה <WH6884> is tried מָגֵ֥ן <WH4043> he [is] a buckler ה֝֗וּא <WH1931> he לְכֹ֤ל ׀ <WH3605> to all הַחֹסִ֬ים <WH2620> to all those that trust בּֽוֹ׃

כִּ֤י <WH3588> For מִ֣י <WH4310> who אֱ֭לוֹהַּ <WH433> For who [is] God מִבַּלְעֲדֵ֣י <WH1107> save יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Jehovah וּמִ֥י <WH4310> who צ֝֗וּר <WH6697> rock זוּלָתִ֥י <WH2108> save אֱלֹהֵֽינוּ׃ <WH430> our God
הָ֭אֵל <WH410> [It is] God הַמְאַזְּרֵ֣נִי <WH247> that girdeth חָ֑יִל <WH2428> me with strength וַיִּתֵּ֖ן <WH5414> and maketh תָּמִ֣ים <WH8549> perfect דַּרְכִּֽי׃ <WH1870> my way
מְשַׁוֶּ֣ה <WH7737> He maketh רַ֭גְלַי <WH7272> my feet כָּאַיָּל֑וֹת <WH355> like hinds' וְעַ֥ל <WH5921> upon בָּ֝מֹתַ֗י <WH1116> me upon my high places יַעֲמִידֵֽנִי׃ <WH5975> [feet] and setteth

מְלַמֵּ֣ד <WH3925> He teacheth יָ֭דַי <WH3027> my hands לַמִּלְחָמָ֑ה <WH4421> to war וְֽנִחֲתָ֥ה <WH5181> is broken קֶֽשֶׁת־ <WH7198> so that a bow נְ֝חוּשָׁ֗ה <WH5154> of steel זְרוֹעֹתָֽי׃ <WH2220> by mine arms

וַתִּתֶּן־ <WH5414> Thou hast also given לִי֮ מָגֵ֪ן <WH4043> me the shield יִ֫שְׁעֶ֥ךָ <WH3468> of thy salvation וִֽימִינְךָ֥ <WH3225> and thy right hand תִסְעָדֵ֑נִי <WH5582> hath holden me up וְֽעַנְוַתְךָ֥ <WH6037> and thy gentleness תַרְבֵּֽנִי׃ <WH7235> hath made me great
תַּרְחִ֣יב <WH7337> Thou hast enlarged צַעֲדִ֣י <WH6806> my steps תַחְתָּ֑י <WH8478> under וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> have not מָ֝עֲד֗וּ <WH4571> did not slip קַרְסֻלָּֽי׃ <WH7166> under me that my feet

אֶרְדּ֣וֹף <WH7291> I have pursued א֭וֹיְבַי <WH341> mine enemies וְאַשִּׂיגֵ֑ם <WH5381> and overtaken וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> did not אָ֝שׁוּב <WH7725> them neither did I turn again עַד־ <WH5704> until כַּלּוֹתָֽם׃ <WH3615> till they were consumed

אֶ֭מְחָצֵם <WH4272> I have wounded וְלֹא־ <WH3808> were not יֻ֣כְלוּ <WH3201> them that they were not able ק֑וּם <WH6965> to rise יִ֝פְּל֗וּ <WH5307> they are fallen תַּ֣חַת <WH8478> under רַגְלָֽי׃ <WH7272> under my feet

וַתְּאַזְּרֵ֣נִי <WH247> For thou hast girded חַ֭יִל <WH2428> me with strength לַמִּלְחָמָ֑ה <WH4421> unto the battle תַּכְרִ֖יעַ <WH3766> thou hast subdued קָמַ֣י <WH6965> under me those that rose up תַּחְתָּֽי׃ <WH8478> under
וְֽאֹיְבַ֗י <WH341> of mine enemies נָתַ֣תָּה <WH5414> Thou hast also given לִּ֣י עֹ֑רֶף <WH6203> me the necks וּ֝מְשַׂנְאַ֗י <WH8130> them that hate אַצְמִיתֵֽם׃ <WH6789> that I might destroy

יְשַׁוְּע֥וּ <WH7768> They cried וְאֵין־ <WH369> there מוֹשִׁ֑יעַ <WH3467> but [there was] none to save עַל־ <WH5921> to יְ֝הוָ֗ה <WH3068> [them even] unto the LORD וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> did not עָנָֽם׃ <WH6030> but he answered

וְֽאֶשְׁחָקֵ֗ם <WH7833> Then did I beat כְּעָפָ֥ר <WH6083> them small as the dust עַל־ <WH5921> and פְּנֵי־ <WH6440> before ר֑וּחַ <WH7307> the wind כְּטִ֖יט <WH2916> as the dirt חוּצ֣וֹת <WH2351> in the streets אֲרִיקֵֽם׃ <WH7324> I did cast them out

תְּפַלְּטֵנִי֮ <WH6403> Thou hast delivered מֵרִ֪יבֵ֫י <WH7379> me from the strivings עָ֥ם <WH5971> of the people תְּ֭שִׂימֵנִי <WH7760> [and] thou hast made לְרֹ֣אשׁ <WH7218> me the head גּוֹיִ֑ם <WH1471> of the heathen עַ֖ם <WH5971> a people לֹא־ <WH3808> have not יָדַ֣עְתִּי <WH3045> [whom] I have not known יַֽעַבְדֽוּנִי׃ <WH5647> shall serve
לְשֵׁ֣מַֽע <WH8088> bruit אֹ֭זֶן <WH241> they יִשָּׁ֣מְעוּ <WH8085> of me they shall obey לִ֑י בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> afflicted נֵ֝כָ֗ר <WH5236> alien יְכַחֲשׁוּ־ <WH3584> shall submit לִֽי׃
בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> afflicted נֵכָ֥ר <WH5236> alien יִבֹּ֑לוּ <WH5034> shall fade away וְ֝יַחְרְג֗וּ <WH2727> and be afraid מִֽמִּסְגְּרֽוֹתֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH4526> out of their close places
חַי־ <WH2416> liveth יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> The LORD וּבָר֣וּךְ <WH1288> and blessed צוּרִ֑י <WH6697> [be] my rock וְ֝יָר֗וּם <WH7311> be exalted אֱלוֹהֵ֥י <WH433> God יִשְׁעִֽי׃ <WH3468> of my salvation

מְפַלְּטִ֗י <WH6403> He delivereth מֵאֹ֫יְבָ֥י <WH341> me from mine enemies אַ֣ף <WH637> Surely מִן־ <WH4480> above קָ֭מַי <WH6965> above those that rise up תְּרוֹמְמֵ֑נִי <WH7311> yea thou liftest me up מֵאִ֥ישׁ <WH376> man חָ֝מָ֗ס <WH2555> me from the violent תַּצִּילֵֽנִי׃ <WH5337> against me thou hast delivered
